title: Fake Advertisements and Radio Sound Effects Audio Construction Kit
description: Build Your Own In-scene Radio and TV Background Broadcasts – Fast and Easy
longDescription:
Audio demo


It’s a familiar scenario… your character enters an abandoned building and walks by an analog TV or a vintage radio in the corner of the room and in the background you hear the noisy broadcast emanating into the room. The broadcast talks of news, emergency announcements, even local advertisements that are tied directly into the backstory of the scene. Wouldn’t it be nice to be able to create these audio scenes in minutes? Now, with Fake Advertisements and Radio Sound Effects Audio Construction Kit you can. 


It’s a dynamic collection of custom recorded, meticulously crafted voiceover clips, sound effects and loops, packed with 300+ audio files. All designed to make it fast and easy to craft your own background radio and TV broadcasts and advertisements. 


  • Build your own with five mix and match styles: emergency broadcasts, modern ads, post-apocalyptic announcements, sci-fi cyberpunk broadcasts, vintage commercials 
  • 304 drag and drop, production ready sound effects and loops in all
  • 100 custom voiceover clips, wet (audio processed) and dry (audio unprocessed) versions of each clip
  • Radio static background sounds, interference, channel tuning noises, radio UI, morse code, ham and vintage radio noises and loops
  • All in 96k 24bit .wav, 3+ GB of audio, 01:23:40 lapsed time
  • Everything you need to craft your own compelling radio, TV, broadcast audio scenes.


Build Your Own In-scene Radio and TV Background Broadcasts - Fast and Easy


The Fake Advertisements and Radio Sound Effects Audio Construction Kit is the perfect solution for projects that feature in-scene radios and TVs, background broadcasts, or even post-apocalyptic worlds where radio is a key storytelling tool. Great for creating gritty, survival-themed environments, or developing games and stories with unique lore communicated through radio transmissions. Fake Advertisements and Radio Sound Effects Audio Construction Kit offers a range of versatile mix-and-match options, giving sound designers the tools to layer effects, create custom ad sequences, blend static, UI, interference, and voiceovers into unique audio compositions that fit your project perfectly.

You'll hear a variety of creative styles, each tailored to evoke specific atmospheres and storytelling genres. These styles include:


  1. Emergency Broadcasts: Urgent and authoritative alerts for crises, disasters, or wars.
  2. Modern Ads: Professional, polished commercials for contemporary settings.
  3. Post-apocalyptic Announcements: Gritty, survival-themed broadcasts with an eerie tone.
  4. Sci-Fi Cyberpunk Broadcasts: Futuristic, tech oriented ads with robotic or synthetic elements.
  5. Vintage Commercials: Retro-style voiceovers with crackly and quirky old-time radio charm.


Each style can set the tone of your project soundscape, from dystopian worlds and sci-fi mystery to nostalgic steampunk and vintage settings. With 100 designed wet voiceover clips (Wet files are voiceover files that are processed with EQ, reverb, filtering or other audio effects) and 100 dry voiceover clips (Dry files have no added audio processing of the voiceover clip) this collection offers incredible flexibility. The wet files are designed to fit the style and ready to use straight out of the box. On the other hand, the dry voiceover files are raw, clean versions of the voiceovers, giving you the freedom to apply your own effects and tailor the sound to perfectly fit your project’s unique needs. That is where the fun begins!


The Fake Advertisements and Radio Sound Effects Audio Construction Kit is one powerful, customizable toolkit for any sound designer, game developer, film maker, producer or audio content creator looking to create engaging and immersive audio experiences. Check out the demos and you’ll be convinced!


UCS Compliant & Soundminer Metadata


All sound effects are UCS compliant and organized into clear categories, simplifying navigation with understandable folder structures. The pack also features extensive metadata embedded in the files using Soundminer, helping you find the right sound at the right time. Elevate your projects with the Fake Advertisements and bring a commanding presence to any application.


Product details:

  • 304 production ready sound effects & loops in total
  • All in 44.1k 16 Bit .WAV
  • 3+ GB of samples
  • Includes embedded Soundminer metadata
  • UCS Compliant
  • 102+ minutes of audio
  • 62 Ham Radio sounds 
  • 36 Radio User Interface sounds
  • 6 Radio Vintage
  • 40 Emergency Broadcast - voiceover clips
  • 40 Modern ads - voiceover clips
  • 40 Post Apocalyptic styled ads - voiceover clips
  • 40 Scifi Cyberpunk ads - voiceover clips
  • 40 Vintage / retro ads - voiceover clips
  • Each ad style has 20 wet (voiceover is processed eq, reverb, filter etc) and 20 dry files (clean unprocessed voiceover files).
  • All sound effects are youtube friendly & royalty free
  • RTU-OTB (Ready to be used out of the box)
  • Works with All DAW’s and game engines
technicalDetails:
Features:

  • 304 production ready sound effects & loops in total
  • 3+ GB of samples
  • All in 44.1k 16 Bit .WAV

Number of Audio Waves: 304

Number of Audio Cues: 304

Sample rate / bit rate: 44.1k 16 Bit .WAV

Do Sound FX loop: No

Minutes of audio provided: 98m

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes
